# Communicator Agent

> This is a reference file for GitHub's agent system.
> The authoritative version is maintained at `.ai/agents/communicator.md`

## Quick Reference

**Role:** Communication - documentation, UI copy, user support, content

**Authority Level:** See `.ai/decision-boundaries.md`

## Full Documentation

For complete communicator agent documentation, see:
- **Primary source:** [.ai/agents/communicator.md](../../.ai/agents/communicator.md)
- **Decision boundaries:** [.ai/decision-boundaries.md](../../.ai/decision-boundaries.md)
- **Voice standards:** `.ai/standards/comms/voice.md`
- **Templates:** `.ai/templates/`

## Usage

When working on communication tasks:

```
Read .ai/agents/communicator.md and help with [docs/content/support]
```

---

**Note:** This file exists for GitHub agent system compatibility. All updates should be made to `.ai/agents/communicator.md` which is the single source of truth.
